data.title: Schkeuditz climate: Weather Schkeuditz & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Schkeuditz

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Schkeuditz

>>average temperature by month Schkeuditz

>>Weather Schkeuditz

The climate in Schkeuditz is warm and temperate. In Schkeuditz there is a lot of rain even in the driest month. This location is classified as Cfb by Köppen and Geiger. The temperature in this location is approximately 10.3 °C | 50.5 °F, as determined by statistical analysis. In a year, the rainfall is 642 mm | 25.3 inch.

The given location is in the northern hemisphere. Summer begins here at the end of June and ends in September. The months of summer are: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Schkeuditz

The driest month is February, with 38 mm | 1.5 inch of rain. The greatest amount of precipitation occurs in July, with an average of 72 mm | 2.8 inch.

average temperature by month Schkeuditz

July is the warmest month of the year. The temperature in July averages 19.7 °C | 67.5 °F. The lowest average temperatures in the year occur in January, when it is around 1.2 °C | 34.1 °F.

Weather by month // weather averages Schkeuditz

<>

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

There is a difference of 34 mm | 1 inch of precipitation between the driest and wettest months. The variation in temperatures throughout the year is 18.6 °C | 33.4 °F.

The month with the highest relative humidity is November (83.52 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is July (64.85 percent). The month with the most rainy days is December (12.67 days). The month with the fewest rainy days is September (9.47 days).

Airport close to Schkeuditz

The closest Airports of Schkeuditz are: Leipzig/Halle Airport (LEJ) 2.66km,Erfurt-Weimar Airport (ERF) 99.56km,Dresden Airport (DRS) 111.64km

You can reach Schkeuditz from this Cities by Plane: London (LCY), Paris (CDG), Cologne (CGN), Bremen (BRE), Funchal (FNC), Hurghada (HRG), Basel (BSL), Frankfurt am Main (FRA), Agadir (AGA), Santa Cruz de Tenerife (TFS), Las Palmas de Gran Canaria (LPA), Heraklion (HER), Barcelona (BCN), Zurich (ZRH), Düsseldorf (DUS), Amsterdam (AMS), Palma de Mallorca (PMI), Antalya (AYT), Stuttgart (STR), Moscow (DME)
